name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
September 13: Differents ways to say hello, introducing yourself, asking for some basic information, partner interview
September 20: Textbook lesson 1 - Hello, my name is...
September 27: Lesson 1 - Where are you from? What languages do you speak?
October 4: Lesson 1 - Doing a phone call
October 11: Lesson 1 - Hotel check-in, filling out forms
October 18: Lesson 1 - Review, test
October 25: Lesson 2 - Family and friends
November 1: Lesson 2 - Introducing family members
November 8: Lesson 2 - Are you married? Do you have kids?
November 15: Lesson 2 - Conjugating verbs, listening exercises
November 22: Lesson 2 - Reading postcards, review, test
November 29: Lesson 3 - Food and drinks
December 6: Lesson 3 - Plural forms, working with a dictionary, at the market
December 13: Lesson 3 - Asking for prices, special offers, measure words
December 20: Lesson 3 - In a restaurant, my favorite things
December 27: Lesson 3 - Dictation, review, test
January 3: Lesson 4 - My apartment
January 10: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 1". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
